TEXT.TITLE: FERRO <FOE> SEES STRONG 2ND QTR, SIX MONTHS
TEXT.BODY: Ferro Corp said it expects to report second quarter earnings of about seven mln dlrs, or about 1.02 dlrs a share, on sales of about 220.0 mln dlrs In the year ago quarter, the maker of industrial specialty materials earned 5.1 mln dlrs or 75 cts a share on sales of 185.1 mln dlrs. Based on its current second quarter estimates, Ferro said it will have earned 11.7 mln dlrs or two dlrs a share on sales of 425 mln dlrs for the six months ending June 30. In the year-ago six-month period, Ferro earned 9.7 mln dlrs or 1.43 dlrs a share on sales of 359.7 mln dlrs. Reuter
